channel.title: DragonFall - The New Era
channel.description:
[center]DragonFall This will be a server pretty much written from scratch. Base - iClarity Cleaned Project Log -
[list]21st October 2009 [ul][li]Added Commands[/li] [li]Changed Walking Cross Colour - Was yellow, is now grey.[/li] [li]Changed Crowns[/li][/ul]
[u]Videos[/u] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UjQ2rL9_n2s

item.title: DragonFall - The New Era

item.description:

Everything in that sense. Take a look at iClarity and you will see what I mean.

item.title: DragonFall - The New Era
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

ranger squad:

Combat, equipping, minigames, everything.

but you said O.o

ranger squad:

Well, my fine sir, I will have you know, I never said it was completely from scratch. I said pretty much from scratch. I am nowhere near experienced enough to build a server completely from scratch.

so its everything from scratch? or pretty much from scratch O.o maybe I am the only one thats stupid>.>dont even agree

item.title: DragonFall - The New Era
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“blakeman8192, post:4, topic:309695”][quote]
This will be a server pretty much written from scratch.
Base -
iClarity Cleaned Project
[/quote]
underlined parts contradict each other. lololol
you can claim that your server base is “blank”, but you will be very ignorant until you understand that even a blank blakescape server (the core of 99% of servers today - including the iClarity Cleaned Project) has a ton of work put into it, has an entire design, and operates on levels of complexity (yes, blakescape/winterlove) that you won’t be able to understand for quite a long time - in truth, any “base” that you use that has features like login, packet handling, player update packet (appearance, movement, etc), walking, etc. is so far from scratch that you might as well take a building, put furniture in it, maybe paint it, and tell everyone that you designed and built it all on your own with your bare hands from scratch. i scoff at you, my good sir![/quote]
well said very well said.

Read full topic

item.title: DragonFall - The New Era
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

This will be a server pretty much [u]written from scratch[/u]. [u]Base[/u] - [u]iClarity Cleaned Project[/u]
underlined parts contradict each other. lololol you can claim that your server base is "blank", but you will be very ignorant until you understand that even a blank blakescape server (the core of 99% of servers today - including the iClarity Cleaned Project) has a [b]ton[/b] of work put into it, has an entire design, and operates on levels of complexity (yes, blakescape/winterlove) that you won't be able to understand for quite a long time - in truth, any "base" that you use that has features like login, packet handling, player update packet (appearance, movement, etc), walking, etc. is so far from scratch that you might as well take a building, put furniture in it, maybe paint it, and tell everyone that you designed and built it all on your own with your bare hands from scratch. i scoff at you, my good sir!

Read full topic
